T02D3375:51b-1: a'arya rakta ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D3375:51b-3: 'phags pa gshin rje dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3375:51b-4: 'phags pa gshin rje dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3375:51b-5: de kho na bzhin du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3375:51b-6: stong pa nyid du rnam par bsams la aam dmar
T02D3375:51b-7: po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um
T02D3375:51b-8: dmar po ste de yongs su gyur pa las mgo
T02D3375:51b-9: bo rlon pa ser pos mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar
T02D3375:51b-10: po la h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par
T02D3375:51b-11: bya'o // de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3375:51b-12: bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed dmar po zhal gcig
T02D3375:51b-14: g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs can khrag gis yongs su bkang ba'i thod pa g-yon na'o //
T02D3375:51b-15: mgo bo rlon pa ser pos mtshan pa'i dbyug pa ni g-yas na'o /
T02D3375:51b-16: klu yis brgyan cing 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D3375:51b-17: skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba /
T02D3375:51b-18: stag gi sham thabs can mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan
T02D3375:51b-19: pa rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud cing
T02D3375:51b-20: ma hirsha 'i steng na sna tshogs kyi padma dang
T02D3375:51b-21: nyi ma la gnas pa bsal par bya'o //
T02D3375:51b-22: bcom ldan 'das ma yang zhal gcig ma /
T02D3375:51b-23: phyag gnyis ma sna tshogs kyi rgyan can /
T02D3375:51b-24: g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
T02D3375:51b-25: myos byed kyis myos shing 'dzag pa /
T02D3375:51b-27: bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu kha sbyor
T02D3375:51b-28: gyi sbyor bas g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis nye bar
T02D3375:52a-1: / de ltar rnam par bsams nas snying ga'i nyi
T02D3375:52a-2: ma la h'um yongs su gyur pa las mgo bos
T02D3375:52a-3: mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po'i dbus su nyi ma
T02D3375:52a-4: la gnas pa'i h'um rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3375:52a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'o //
T02D3375:52a-6: bcom ldan 'das ma'i aa: yongs su gyur pa las padma rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3375:52a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D3375:52a-8: na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya
T02D3375:52a-9: bas lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D3375:52a-10: de'i rjes su lte ba'i 'og tu padma dmar po
T02D3375:52a-11: 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du hr'i:yig dmar po 'bar
T02D3375:52a-13: de nas aom a'am dzr'i kham h'um zhes bya ba'i
T02D3375:52a-14: sngags kyi yi ges dam tshig gi rdzas bsten pa
T02D3375:52a-15: sngon du 'gro bas thun gnyis dang gsum du bsgom
T02D3375:52a-16: par bya'o // sngags kyi bzlas pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D3375:52a-17: aom hr'i:shtr'i:bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
T02D3375:52a-18: aom ya m'anta ka h'um zhes bya ba'o //
T02D3375:52a-19: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3375:52a-20: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
